name: Santa lost his gifts
description:
A small 2D holiday-themed platformer with 3 levels. The game takes about 5 to 15 minutes to beat or longer depending on the player's skill.

The player only has one life/health point. When you jump in the water or get hit by a snowball the game will return to the menu.

There is no visual violence in the game. When the player "Dies" he will shrink. Snow enemies will also shrink making the game suitable for everyone to play.

Consider donating if you like the game so I might extend the game next year ho-ho-ho. Will see.

Thanks for playing.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys 

ESC - Exit game
